scripts.deploy: npm run build; npm run clean; git stash; git switch gh-pages; rm docs/index.html; cp -r dist/index.html assets docs/; rm -rf dist; git add -u docs; git commit -m 'deploy gh-pages/docs'; git push -u origin gh-pages; git switch main; git stash pop
scripts.pack: npm run clean; cd ./assets/;advpng -i 1000 -z -4 tilemap_packed_compact_tileset.png;cd ../; npm run build;npm run clean; cd dist; advzip -i 1000 -4 ../package.zip -a ./*
